body_html: Yup I'm on Ubuntu 16.04. Makes sense that they don't have all the functionality in the C API since it is mostly meant to be used for building bindings to other languages. I hope they eventually add more features to the C API as it is pretty convenient for deployment. It's a lot easier to just pull down the C API binaries than compiling the source code into a C++ shared library.

body: Yup I'm on Ubuntu 16.04.  Makes sense that they don't have all the functionality in the C API since it is mostly meant to be used for building bindings to other languages.  I hope they eventually add more features to the C API as it is pretty convenient for deployment.  It's a lot easier to just pull down the C API binaries than compiling the source code into a C++ shared library.
